channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware Horizon Agent for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware Horizon Agent for Linux

item.title: CVE-2022-22964|2024-08-03T03:28:42.580Z -- vmware -- vmware%20horizon%20agent%20for%20linux
item.description: VMware Horizon Agent for Linux (prior to 22.x) contains a local privilege escalation that allows a user to escalate to root due to a vulnerable configuration file.

item.title: CVE-2022-22962|2024-08-03T03:28:42.567Z -- vmware -- vmware%20horizon%20agent%20for%20linux
item.description: VMware Horizon Agent for Linux (prior to 22.x) contains a local privilege escalation as a user is able to change the default shared folder location due to a vulnerable symbolic link. Successful exploitation can result in linking to a root owned file.
